actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend sections 8331 and 8332 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to the creditable service of U.S. Commissioners for purposes of civil service retirement.

summary.text: Grants credit for time spent as a United States Commissioner for purposes of civil service retirement, with the exception of any time during such period for which credit was received in a different capacity. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8331, 8332)

titles.title: A bill to amend sections 8331 and 8332 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to the creditable service of U.S. Commissioners for purposes of civil service retirement.
